

# booking_movie_db

## admin login:

  * username: admin
  * password: admin

## Security Statement:
 
 * htmlspecialchar
 * htmlentites
 * stripcslashes
 * trim
 * filter_input

## Functionality

 * contain all CRUD opearation ( Search, Update, Delete, Read, Create )
